tool_description: The Perfect Tense API is an artificial intelligence powered spelling and grammar API. All you have to do is provide a piece of text and the Perfect Tense API will automatically return a proofread version of the text, along with all spelling and grammar mistakes.
name: Perfect Tense
title: Perfect Tense

api_list.name: usage
api_list.description: This endpoint provides User's API limit information. It shows the max number of API requests available per day, and how many are remaining for today.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://perfecttense.p.rapidapi.com/usage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "perfecttense.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://perfecttense.p.rapidapi.com/usage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "perfecttense.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
